p: A hypersensitivity reaction occurred in one patient who received IFN. The reaction presented with maculopapular rash on the trunk and both upper and lower limbs. However, the patient was taking herbal medicine for cough consisting of thyme and honey and other medications, like hydroxychloroquine and lopinavir-ritonavir, concomitantly. Interferon was discontinued after the fourth dose, and rashes began to disappear within 3 days. According to the Naranjo score, the reaction possibly was due to IFN.
